movies.title: Dune
movies.synopsis: In the distant future, a noble family becomes embroiled in a conflict that spans generations on the desert planet Arrakis.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.synopsis: Peter Parker's world changes when Doctor Strange's spell goes awry, bringing villains from other realities into his own.

movies.title: The Batman
movies.synopsis: In Gotham City, a mysterious vigilante known as Batman sets out to uncover the truth about his past, while facing a new threat from the Riddler.

movies.title: No Time to Die
movies.synopsis: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when Felix Leiter, an old friend from the CIA, turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

movies.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies.synopsis: After more than thirty years of service as one of the Navy's top aviators, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs, pushing the envelope as a courageous test pilot and dodging the advancement in rank that would ground him.

movies.title: Encanto
movies.synopsis: A Colombian girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

movies.title: The Power of the Dog
movies.synopsis: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

movies.title: Don't Look Up
movies.synopsis: Two low-level astronomers must go on a giant media tour to warn mankind of an approaching comet that will destroy planet Earth.

movies.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
movies.synopsis: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.

movies.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
movies.synopsis: The sequel to Black Panther (2018) continues the journey of King T'Challa and the exploration of the world of Wakanda.

movies.title: Elvis
movies.synopsis: A look at the life of the legendary rock and roll star, Elvis Presley.

movies.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.synopsis: Sequel to Avatar (2009), continuing the journey of the Na'vi and their new challenges in Pandora.

tvShows.title: Game of Thrones
tvShows.synopsis: A tale of power, betrayal, and dragons in the fictional continents of Westeros and Essos.

tvShows.title: Breaking Bad
tvShows.synopsis: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer partners with a former student to build a drug empire.

tvShows.title: The Mandalorian
tvShows.synopsis: A lone bounty hunter navigates the outer reaches of the galaxy after the fall of the Empire.

tvShows.title: The Crown
tvShows.synopsis: The political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

tvShows.title: Sherlock
tvShows.synopsis: Modern-day adaptation of Arthur Conan Doyle's Sherlock Holmes stories.

tvShows.title: The Witcher
tvShows.synopsis: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

tvShows.title: Friends
tvShows.synopsis: Follows the lives of six friends living in New York City as they navigate through love and life.

tvShows.title: Peaky Blinders
tvShows.synopsis: A gangster family epic set in Birmingham, England, in the aftermath of World War I.

tvShows.title: The Office
tvShows.synopsis: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

tvShows.title: The Boys
tvShows.synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

tvShows.title: Stranger Things
tvShows.synopsis: A group of kids uncover supernatural mysteries in their small town.

tvShows.title: Westworld
tvShows.synopsis: A dark odyssey about the dawn of artificial consciousness and the evolution of sin in a world where every human appetite can be indulged.
